column4: Anyone have recommendations for how to backup my system before I resize my partition?  There's so many methods out there:  tar, dar, partimage, dd, and others... I want something easy to restore and reliable... any suggestions?
this is just too easy: cp -a <path> ?
cp is better than : tar, dar, rsync ... any reason why?
well, it's on every reasonable rescue cd......... and even in most initrds :-)
